alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 2:44PM EDT until July 14 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Livingston County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 243 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gregory, or near Pinckney, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pinckney around 255 PM EDT. Hamburg around 320 PM EDT. Brighton around 325 PM EDT. Whitmore Lake around 335 PM EDT. South Lyon around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Island Lake State Recreation Area, Chilson, Lakeland, Unadilla, Pinckney State Recreation Area and Hell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
